about_the_game:
Scribe is a scribe simulator in which you can secretly shape the destinies of the inhabitants of the estate: resolve disputes, influence the course of family intrigues, decide who lives and who does not. Choose what to write in letters and whether to change their recipients!

Scribes are appointed to noblemen by the church, so your chief is not only the Baron, but also the Bishop. If you anger one of them too much, then your life will be short... In addition, keep an eye on your own state. It's hard to live with the realization that your actions are causing people to die and families to crumble.

Features of the game:

  • You can Influence the destinies of characters by choosing what to write in letters and whether to change their recipients!
  • Keep track of the parameters that reflect the attitude of the Baron and the Bishop towards you, as well as your state.
  • Read the morning mail to learn a lot about the world outside the walls of the house...

content_descriptors.notes: References to smoking and alcohol consumption, text descriptions and images of character deaths.
